scenario.name: Basic SIP test
scenario.send: REGISTER sip:localhost:5080 SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/UDP [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] Max-Forwards: 70 To: <sip:1000@localhost:5080> From: <sip:1000@localhost:5080>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 REGISTER Contact: <sip:1000@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Authorization: Digest username="1000", realm="asterisk", nonce="", uri="sip:localhost:5080", response="" Content-Length: 0
